function.summary: Returns the child element of the segment or scenario that contains the typed dimension value if there is a value for the dimension in either the segment or scenario of the item and returns the empty sequence otherwise.

input.name: item
input.xhtml:p: The item that the dimension value is required for.

input.name: dimension
input.xhtml:p: The QName of the dimension that the value is required for.

output.xhtml:p: Returns the child element of the segment or scenario that contains the typed dimension value if there is a value for the dimension in either the segment or scenario of the item and returns the empty sequence otherwise. The data type of the child and its descendant elements have the appropriate type based on the Post Schema Validation Infoset.

error.xhtml:p: This error MUST be thrown the dimension does not specify an typed dimension in the reference discoverable taxonomy set.

reg:revision.xhtml:p: Made the function segment/scenario agnostic, renamed without segment/scenario in name.
Removed the xfie:invalidDimensionForFact error code because any such problems are expected to be detected by pre-processing validation of the instance containing the fact.
